entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
